channel.title: Dl client wont connect to server? help please
channel.description: Hello moparscape ive recently been trying to create a downloadable client but i dont really know much bout clients im more about the source :) I changed the server ip to my no-ip (also i tryed my normal ip) i deleted all class files then compiled then i jarred my client right and i set to correct class files then i created keystore and signed with correct alias and passes then i zipped the files put on dropbox then when my friends try to open it it loads and everything but says error connecting to server If anybody can tell me what i did wrong i would really apreccaite it Thanks!

I changed the server ip to my no-ip (also i tryed my normal ip) i deleted all class files then compiled then i jarred my client right and i set to correct class files then i created keystore and signed with correct alias and passes then i zipped the files put on dropbox then when my friends try to open it it loads and everything but says error connecting to server
